mapper.select: SELECT STTS_NO AS "sttsNo", STTS_NM AS "sttsNm" FROM SR_STTS
SELECT DISTINCT(SYS_NM) AS "sysNm", SYS_NO AS "sysNo" FROM SYSTEM
SELECT DISTINCT(USER_OGDP) AS "userOgdp" FROM USERS WHERE USER_TYPE='고객사'
SELECT DISTINCT(USER_DP_NM) AS "userDpNm" FROM USERS WHERE USER_TYPE='고객사'

SELECT s.SR_NO AS "srNo", s.SR_TTL AS "srTtl", s.SR_REG_DATE AS "srRegDate", s.SR_DDLN_DATE AS "srDdlnDate", s.SR_PRY AS "srPry", s.SR_STD AS "srStd", s.SR_CN AS "srCn", u.USER_NM AS "userNm", u.USER_OGDP AS "userOgdp", u.USER_DP_NM AS "userDpNm", st.STTS_NM AS "sttsNm", SYS_NM AS "sysNm" FROM SR s ,USERS u, SR_STTS st, SYSTEM sys WHERE SR_CUST_NO = u.USER_NO AND s.STTS_NO = st.STTS_NO AND s.SYS_NO = sys.SYS_NO AND s.SR_NO = #{srNo}
